column1: 262115,Cyber Security Advice and Assessment Specialist,,"Identify security threats and determine counter measures
column3: Analyse risks to minimise losses or damages
column5: Implement security measures for computer or information systems
column9: Analyse security of systems, network or data
column11: Monitor the security of digital information
column13: Collaborate with others to resolve information technology issues
column15: Read documents to gather technical information
column17: Develop computer or information security policies or procedures
column19: Collect, process and preserve digital records or evidence in accordance with procedures
column21: Respond to cyber attacks and restore protection to systems if compromised
column23: Conduct legal cyberattack simulations by designing and utilising hacking tools
column25: Collaborate with others to determine design specifications or details
column29: Analyse data to identify or resolve operational problems
column31: Manage information technology projects or system activities
column33: Train others in cyber security issues
column35: Provide recommendations to others about computer hardware or software
column37: Update knowledge about emerging industry or technology trends
column39: Conduct research to gain information about products or processes
column45: Analyse project data to determine specifications or requirements
column47: Develop models of information or communications systems
